Package com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes

Class UpdateRequestsQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.vcs.changes.UpdateRequestsQueue

  • public final class UpdateRequestsQueue
extends java.lang.Object
    ChangeListManager updates scheduler. Tries to zip several update requests into one (if starts and see several requests in the queue) own inner synchronization
